summary: Represents a repeatable tile that can be used to cover the area of an [Entity](/documentation/Entity).

properties.name: loaded
properties.description: A boolean value indicating whether or not the asset has been loaded.

properties.name: size
properties.description: An object containing two properties, ```width``` and ```height```, which represent the size of the area that the tile should cover.

methods.name: draw
methods.description: Draws the asset to the [Layer](/documentation/Layer) that the owning [Entity](/documentation/Entity) exists on.

methods.name: onLoad
methods.description: The function to be called when the asset has finished loading.

methods.name: prepare
methods.description: Prepare the information required to load the asset.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
